update t_order set no = #{no,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, address = #{address,jdbcType=CHAR}, receiver_name = #{receiverName,jdbcType=CHAR}, receiver_number = #{receiverNumber,jdbcType=CHAR}, delivery_number = #{deliveryNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
